BasicInfo.short: Working to make the Internet safe for business.

Products.name: Cloud Application Visibility and Control
Products.description: Zscaler is always inline, inspecting every byte of traffic, so you’ll be able to see and control the cloud applications in your organization

Products.name: Bandwidth Control
Products.description: Zscaler lets you set bandwidth priority for all users at all locations, across all your cloud-based applications

Products.name: Web Security
Products.description: Protect your organization with the world’s most widely deployed web security platform

Products.name: SIEM Integration
Products.description: Zscaler’s patented Nanolog technology was created to ensure that real-time logs of users’ web transactions are private and transportable

Products.name: SSL Inspection
Products.description: Zscaler inspects all internet traffic, including SSL encrypted traffic and automatically blocks threats in real time

Products.name: Guest Wi-Fi Security
Products.description: Easily apply security and acceptable use policies to your guest Wifi network

Products.name: Zscaler App
Products.description: Zscaler App delivers security for all of your remote users, regardless of device type or OS

Products.name: Data Loss Prevention
Products.description: Inspect all your internet traffic in one click with Zscaler Data Loss Prevention.

Products.name: Behavior Analysis/Sandboxing
Products.description: Sandbox suspicious traffic for all your users and stop threats before they hit your network with Zscaler

Products.name: Next Generation Firewall
Products.description: With Zscaler, you can get cloud firewall protection that fits your users’ needs today.

CurrentTeam.title: Senior Vice President of Product Management
Chief Revenue Officer and Global VP of Sales

PastTeam.title: Senior Vice President of Worldwide Operations
